metadata.creator: Teodoro Benigno
metadata.description: This biographical book of Ninoy Aquino written by Teodoro Benigno in observance of the 10th year anniversary of his death contains the latter part of Ninoy’s life. Some of the information include Ninoy’s life during Martial Law period, his exile to America, his tragic death and martyrdom.
metadata.subject: Ninoy Aquino
metadata.title: Ninoy Aquino Portrait Of A Hero
metadata.subject: Corazon C. Aquino
